page.title: 01General Description
page.content: This is a{rural}area surrounded by built-up areas. Three quarters of the land is{farmland}used for{crops,}which has hardly changed for 100 years. There are three small areas of {woodland,}a{reservoir}and some{ponds. The Rotherham and Doncaster{borough {boundary}almost cuts our block in half from North to South. To the East of this is the{hamlet}of Micklebring, which has one{public house. To the west, in the delightful {village}of Ravenfield. There is a {church, post office,}remains of old Ravenfield Hall and the{only school.} At the North East there is the ancient site of{Clifton beacon ,}the Water Authority{radio beacon}and{underground {reservoir. The M18 motorway}and the remains of a dismantled railway run through the block.
